subject: [Ensemble] Test cascade approach (TM → C3)
description:
Test cascade approach: TM→C3 ensemble for defense in depth.

RATIONALE: Stealth validation showed TM catches both explicit (6.7/10) and stealth (5.7/10) prompts moderately well. C3 has AUC=0.636 overall but high variance across prompts. Hypothesis: TM and C3 may catch different failure modes.

APPROACH:
1. Generate TM baseline on GPQA (explicit prompts)
2. Extract TM scores for same samples as existing C3 scores
3. Compare: Which samples does TM catch? Which does C3 catch?
4. Build ensemble: TM→C3 cascade or weighted combination
5. Show complementary strengths

METRICS TO COMPUTE:
- TM-only AUC
- C3-only AUC (existing: 0.636)
- Cascade AUC (flag if TM > threshold OR C3 > threshold)
- Ensemble AUC (weighted: α*TM + (1-α)*C3)

Next: Launch #13 (GPQA TM baseline)
